rows.label: tev001392_MSG0001
rows.name: Good day to you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0002
rows.name: Rock and I were just relaxing here at the park.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0003
rows.name:
Whilst there is little greenery, it is still enough to help
calm my nerves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0004
rows.name:
My home planet was a lush and verdant place
that was full of trees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0005
rows.name:
I suppose being here reminds me of home, if only
a little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0006
rows.name:
Tell me about this Earth from which your people hail.
What was it like?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_JNK0010
rows.name: Speak of Images

rows.label: tev001392_SEL0011
rows.name:
Say that you've seen pictures of both gorgeous
natural areas and impressive industrial ones.

rows.label: tev001392_JNK0020
rows.name: Speak of History

rows.label: tev001392_SEL0021
rows.name:
Say you've read that its natural beauty was
gradually destroyed by industry and greed.

rows.label: tev001392_JNK0030
rows.name: Speak of Facts

rows.label: tev001392_SEL0031
rows.name:
Explain that its surface was 30 percent
land and 70 percent water.

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0007
rows.name: Interesting. It sounds very much like Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0008
rows.name:
After all, Primordia is lush and green, but also has
a large city built upon it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0009
rows.name:
If nature and industry were able to coexist on Earth,
it must have been a wonderful planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0010
rows.name:
If it were somehow possible for me to visit,
I'd love to go and see its sights.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0011
rows.name:
Although I worry that Rock wouldn't have a place
to sleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0012
rows.name: I see. How terribly sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0013
rows.name:
We all live upon planets, and are a part of the natural
order they host.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0014
rows.name:
Destroying the planet upon which one lives is
tantamount to destroying oneself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0015
rows.name:
Is it any different from destroying a bridge while you
are yet walking across it? I think not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0016
rows.name:
Perhaps there were circumstances that made such
destruction unavoidable?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0017
rows.name:
...No. Forgive me. Nothing good can come of
struggling for justifications.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0018
rows.name: Instead, let us strive to take better care of THIS world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0019
rows.name: Is that right? Fascinating![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0020
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0021
rows.name: Um...is that all you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0022
rows.name:
Well, I suppose that is enough for me to visualize
Earth in...rather broad strokes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0023
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0024
rows.name:
With that much water, for example, one would imagine
Earth was quite blue![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0025
rows.name:
Maybe some lush, green land here and there.
Probably a few rocks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0026
rows.name:
The character of its inhabitants suggests a world rich
in nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0027
rows.name:
For example, I could see the Prone coming from a
harsh world on which seeds could find no purchase,
but not humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001392_MSG0028
rows.name:
I do not know if these conjectures are correct,
but the image I have of Earth is quite lovely.[ST:wait ]
